summary.span: 提供逐个或成批创建提供程序实例的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for creating provider instances, either singly or in a batch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 方法，该方法引发的任何异常都将通过方法向上冒泡 。This method calls the method, and any exceptions thrown by that method will bubble up through the method.
